#include "8051.h"
void main()
{
unsigned int UP[16] ={
0b00000000,
0b11000000,
0b11100000,
0b11110000,
0b11110000,
0b11110000,
0b11100000,
0b11000000,
0b11000000,
0b11100000,
0b11110000,
0b11110000,
0b11110000,
0b11100000,
0b11000000,
0b00000000};
unsigned int DOWN[16] ={
0b00000000,
0b00000001,
0b00000011,
0b00000111,
0b00001111,
0b00011111,
0b00111111,
0b01111111,
0b01111111,
0b00111111,
0b00011111,
0b00001111,
0b00000111,
0b00000011,
0b00000001,
0b00000000
};
int i=0;
for (i=15;i>=0;i--){
P1 = UP[i];
P3 = DOWN[i];
P00 = 1;
P00 = 0;
}
while (1){}
}
